translated: The second discussion of perception and feeling

analyzed: saññā vedayita nirodha samāpatti lokiyā ati
translated: Is the attainment of the cessation of perception and feeling mundane?
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …

analyzed: a rūpā avacarāti  na ha ivam vattabbe pe
saññā vedayita nirodha samāpatti lokiyā ati
translated: “Then is it neither mundane nor supramundane?”
The second discussion of perception and feeling is finished.
